A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a terrible movie.   The central plot didn't make sense.  The main subplot was pointless and did not add to the narrative.  The comedy had tone issues that made heroes no longer heroic and villains no longer villainous.  The movie also had continuity issues with the other movie of the trilogy and with the entire movie series.  I disliked how the character of of Luke Skywalker was handled.  The special effects were great. 1/10
